articles.title: Monkeypox outbreak: You could be bringing back an unwanted guest after your European holiday - 7NEWS
articles.description: Aussies soaking up the summer sun in a European getaway could bring a fresh threat home with them.
articles.content:
Keen Australian travellers have flocked at the chance to swap the winter chill for summer sun in a European holiday.
